001import java.util.Deque;
002import java.util.ArrayDeque;
003import java.util.Stack;
004import java.util.Scanner;
005import java.io.File;
006import java.io.PrintWriter;
007import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
008
009/**
010 * Moteur du jeu d'aventure
011 *
012 * @author Marie Emilienne Gnamien
013 * @version 15/03/2024
014 */
015public class GameEngine
016{
017    private UserInterface aGui;
018    private Parser aParser;
019    private Player aPlayer;
020    
021    /**
022    * Constructeur du jeu où les pièces sont créées.
023    */
024    public GameEngine() {
025        String vPrenom = javax.swing.JOptionPane.showInputDialog( "what is your name ?" );
026        this.aPlayer = new Player(vPrenom);
027        this.createRooms();
028        this.aParser = new Parser();
029    }//GameEngine()
030    
031    /**
032     * Création de l'interface et appel du message de bienvenue.
033     * @param pUserInterface UserInterface
034     */   
035    public void setGUI( final UserInterface pUserInterface )
036    {
037        this.aGui = pUserInterface;
038        this.printWelcome();
039    }//setGUI()
040    
041    /**
042    *
043    * Affiche la pièce actuelle et les sorties possibles.
044    * 
045    */
046    private void printLocationInfo(){
047        this.aGui.println(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription());
048        this.aGui.showImage(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName());
049    }//printLocationInfo()
050
051    /**
052    *
053    * Affiche le message de bienvenue dès le lancement du jeu.
054    *
055    */
056    private void printWelcome(){
057    this.aGui.print("\n");
058    this.aGui.println("Welcome to 3417.");
059    this.aGui.print("\n");
060    this.aGui.println("Another day in this boring place..."); 
061    this.aGui.println("Grandpa asked me to help with stuff at the store today.");
062    this.aGui.println("\n");
063    this.aGui.println("Type 'help' if you need help."); 
064    this.aGui.print("\n");
065    if(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null){
066        this.aGui.showImage(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName());
067    }
068    }//printWelcome()
069    
070    /**
071    *
072    * Création de toutes les pièces du jeu.
073    */
074   
075    private void createRooms() {
076        Room vConvenienceStore = new Room("at grandpa's convenience store","conveniencestore.jpg");
077        Room vStreet1 = new Room("in the first street","street1.jpg");
078        Room vStreet2 = new Room("in the Second street","street2.jpg");
079        Room vStreet3 = new Room("in the Third street","street3.jpg");
080        Room vRoom = new Room("in her room","bedroom.jpg");
081        Room vBasement = new Room("in the basement","basement.jpg");
082        Room vSecretWorkShop = new Room("at the Secret workshop","secretworkshop.jpg");
083        Room vBricABrac = new Room("at the bric-a-brac","bricabrac.jpg");
084        Room vTrainStation = new Room("at the Train Station","trainstation.jpg");
085        Room vPlatform = new Room("on the Platform","platform.jpg");
086        Room vSecretBasement = new Room("at the secret basement entrance","secretbasement.jpg");
087        Room vArena = new Room("in the arena","arena.jpg");
088        
089        Item vKeyCard = new Item("keyCard","keyCard - a transparent keycard made out of glass.", 5);
090        Item vBroom = new Item("broom","broom - an old and dusty broom.", 700);
091        Item vMilk = new Item("milk"," milk - \"fresh milk from your favorite laboratory !\" ",800);
092        Item vGums = new Item("gums", "gums - a box of gums \"for bad breath\" ", 100);
093        Item vArticulatedArmV1 = new Item("armV1"," armV1 - Articulated Arm V1 \" based on a low technology quality \" ", 1250);
094        Item vPills = new Item("pills", " pills - purple pills : \" do not consume these without a doctor's advice. \" ", 5);
095        Item vMagicCookie = new Item("magicCookie", "magic Cookie - ???",100);
096        
097        
098        
099        vSecretBasement.addItem("pills",vPills);
100        vBricABrac.addItem("armV1", vArticulatedArmV1);
101        
102        vConvenienceStore.addItem("gums",vGums);
103        vConvenienceStore.addItem("magicCookie", vMagicCookie);
104        vRoom.addItem("keyCard",vKeyCard);
105        vBasement.addItem("broom",vBroom);
106        vBasement.addItem("milk", vMilk);
107        
108        vConvenienceStore.setExit("north",vStreet2);
109        vConvenienceStore.setExit("down", vBasement);
110        vConvenienceStore.setExit("south",vRoom);
111        vConvenienceStore.setExit("west",vStreet1);
112        vConvenienceStore.setExit("east",vStreet3);
113        
114        vStreet1.setExit("north", vBricABrac);
115        vStreet1.setExit("south", null);
116        vStreet1.setExit("west", null);
117        vStreet1.setExit("east", vConvenienceStore);
118        
119        vStreet2.setExit("north", null);
120        vStreet2.setExit("south", vConvenienceStore);
121        vStreet2.setExit("west", null);
122        vStreet2.setExit("east", null);
123        
124        vStreet3.setExit("north", null);
125        vStreet3.setExit("south", vTrainStation);
126        vStreet3.setExit("west", vConvenienceStore);
127        vStreet3.setExit("east", null);
128        
129
130        vRoom.setExit("north", vConvenienceStore);
131        vRoom.setExit("south", null);
132        vRoom.setExit("west", null);
133        vRoom.setExit("east", null);
134        
135        vBasement.setExit("north", null);
136        vBasement.setExit("south", null);
137        vBasement.setExit("west", null);
138        vBasement.setExit("up",vConvenienceStore);
139        vBasement.setExit("east", vSecretWorkShop);
140        
141        
142        vSecretWorkShop.setExit("north", null);
143        vSecretWorkShop.setExit("south", null);
144        vSecretWorkShop.setExit("west", vBasement);
145        vSecretWorkShop.setExit("east", null);
146        
147        vBricABrac.setExit("north", null);
148        vBricABrac.setExit("south", vStreet1);
149        vBricABrac.setExit("west", null);
150        vBricABrac.setExit("east", null);
151        
152        vTrainStation.setExit("north", vStreet3);
153        vTrainStation.setExit("south", vPlatform);
154        vTrainStation.setExit("west", null);
155        vTrainStation.setExit("east", null);      
156
157        vPlatform.setExit("north", vTrainStation);
158        vPlatform.setExit("south", null);
159        vPlatform.setExit("west", null);
160        vPlatform.setExit("east", vSecretBasement); 
161
162        vSecretBasement.setExit("north", null);
163        vSecretBasement.setExit("south", null);
164        vSecretBasement.setExit("west", vPlatform);
165        vSecretBasement.setExit("east", vArena); 
166        
167        vArena.setExit("north",null);
168        vArena.setExit("south",null);
169        vArena.setExit("west",vSecretBasement);
170        vArena.setExit("east",null);
171        
172        this.aPlayer.changeRoom(vConvenienceStore);
173    }//createRooms()
174    
175        /**
176        *
177        * Affiche la description du lieu actuel.
178        */
179    private void look(){
180        this.aGui.println(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription());
181    }//look()
182    
183        /**
184        *   Affiche un message dans la fenêtre lorsque l'utilisateur entre la commande eat 
185        * @param pItem nom de l'Item
186        */
187    private void eat(final String pItem){
188        if(pItem.equals("magicCookie")){
189            this.aPlayer.changeMaxWeight();
190            this.aPlayer.getInventory().removeItem(pItem);
191        }
192        else{
193        this.aGui.println("You have eaten now and you are not hungry any more.");
194        }
195    }//eat()
196    
197        /**
198        * Permet de revenir dans la salle précédente une fois la commande entrée par l'utilisateur.
199        */
200    private void back(){
201        if(this.aPlayer.back()){
202            this.printLocationInfo();
203        }
204        else{
205            this.aGui.println("You can't go back...");
206        return;
207        }
208    }//back()
209    
210    /**
211     * Permet de lire le fichier texte mis en paramètre
212     * @param pTextFichier fichier texte
213     */
214    private void lecture(final String pTextFichier){
215        Scanner vSc;
216        try{
217        vSc = new Scanner(new File(pTextFichier));
218        while(vSc.hasNextLine()){
219            String vLigne = vSc.nextLine();
220            this.interpretCommand(vLigne);
221        }
222        
223        vSc.close();
224        }
225        catch(final FileNotFoundException pFNFE){
226            
227        }
228        
229    }//lecture()
230    
231        /**
232        *
233        * Retourne un booléen après traitement de la commande entrée par l'utilisateur.
234        * @param pWord Commande entrée par l'utilisateur.
235        */
236       
237        public void interpretCommand(final String pWord){
238        this.aGui.println( "> " + pWord );
239        Command vCommand = this.aParser.getCommand(pWord); 
240        
241        if(vCommand.isUnknown()) {
242            this.aGui.println("I don't know what you mean ?");
243            return;
244        }
245        
246        String vCommandWord = vCommand.getCommandWord();
247    
248        if(vCommandWord.equals("help")){
249            this.printHelp();
250        }
251
252        else if(vCommandWord.equals("go")){
253            this.aPlayer.addStackRoom();
254            this.goRoom(vCommand);
255        }
256        else if(vCommandWord.equals("look")){
257            this.look();
258        }
259        else if(vCommandWord.equals("eat")){
260            if(vCommand.hasSecondWord() && this.aPlayer.getInventory().containsItem(vCommand.getSecondWord())){
261                this.eat(vCommand.getSecondWord());
262            }
263            else{
264            this.aGui.println("You can't do that");
265        }
266        }
267        
268        else if(vCommandWord.equals("back")){
269            if(vCommand.hasSecondWord()){
270                this.aGui.println("You can't do that...");
271            }
272            else{
273                this.back();
274            }
275        }
276        else if(vCommandWord.equals("take")){
277            if(vCommand.hasSecondWord()){
278                if(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getItems().containsItem(vCommand.getSecondWord())){
279                this.aGui.println(this.aPlayer.take(vCommand.getSecondWord()));
280            } 
281            
282            else{
283                this.aGui.println("This item is unavailable..");
284            }
285            
286            }
287            else{
288                this.aGui.println("You can't do that...");
289            }
290        }
291        
292        else if(vCommandWord.equals("drop")){
293            if(vCommand.hasSecondWord()){
294                if(!this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getItems().containsItem(vCommand.getSecondWord())){
295                this.aPlayer.drop(vCommand.getSecondWord());
296                }
297                else{
298                this.aGui.println("This item is unavailable..");
299                }
300            }
301            else{
302                this.aGui.println("You can't do that...");
303            }
304        }
305
306        else if (vCommandWord.equals("items")){
307            if (vCommand.hasSecondWord()){
308                this.aGui.println( "You can't do that.." );
309            }
310            else{
311                this.aGui.println(this.aPlayer.items());
312            }
313        }
314        
315        else if (vCommandWord.equals("quit")){
316            if (vCommand.hasSecondWord()){
317                this.aGui.println( "Quit what?" );
318            }
319            else{
320                this.endGame();
321            }
322        }
323        else if(vCommandWord.equals("test")){
324            if(vCommand.hasSecondWord() && vCommand.getSecondWord().equals("essai")){
325                this.lecture("essai.txt");
326            }
327            else if(vCommand.hasSecondWord() && vCommand.getSecondWord().equals("victoire")){
328                this.lecture("victoire.txt");
329            }
330            else if(vCommand.hasSecondWord() && vCommand.getSecondWord().equals("court")){
331                this.lecture("court.txt");
332            }
333            else if(vCommand.hasSecondWord() && vCommand.getSecondWord().equals("all")){
334                this.lecture("all.txt");
335            }
336        }
337        else{
338            this.aGui.println("Erreur du programmeur : commande non reconnue !");
339        }
340    
341    }//interpretCommand()
342    
343        /**
344    *
345    * Affiche le message d'aide.
346    */
347    private void printHelp(){
348    this.aGui.println("");
349    this.aGui.println("You are wandering around Nydia...");
350    this.aGui.println("If you lost your way, your command words are : ");
351    this.aGui.println("");
352    this.aGui.println(this.aParser.getCommandString());
353    }//printHelp()
354    
355    
356    /**
357    *
358    * Permet de se déplacer entre les différentes pièces du jeu.
359    * @param pRoom pièce dans laquelle l'utilisateur veut se rendre
360    */
361   
362    private void goRoom(final Command pRoom){
363        Room vNextRoom = null;
364        String vDirection = pRoom.getSecondWord();
365        
366        if(!pRoom.hasSecondWord()){
367                this.aGui.println("Go where ?");
368                return;
369            }
370        vNextRoom = this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getExit(vDirection);
371        
372        if(vNextRoom != null){
373            this.aPlayer.changeRoom(vNextRoom);
374            this.aGui.println(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription());
375            if(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null){
376                this.aGui.showImage(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName());
377            }
378        }
379        else if(vNextRoom == null){
380            this.aGui.println("There is no path!");
381            return;
382        }
383        else{
384            this.aGui.println("Unknown direction !");
385        }
386    } // Game
387    
388    /** Procédure d'arrêt du jeu.
389    */
390    private void endGame()
391    {
392        this.aGui.println( "Thank you for playing.  Good bye." );
393        this.aGui.enable( false );
394    }
395
396}
